narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 12-year-old female was last seen at Prince George at 2025-10-03T21:56:39.656445+00:00. The child was reported missing by parent after failing to meet a friend.

narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 5 hours of disappearance, movement cues entered vehicle and headed northbound on I-95 suggest travel northbound along I-264. A black 2024 Honda Passport was observed departing near Prince George, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 11 hours later, a neighbor reported someone matching the description (12-year-old female, wearing red hoodie, navy sweatpants, red Crocs) near Craig.
witness_accounts.clothing: red hoodie, navy sweatpants, red Crocs
witness_accounts.behavior: switching vehicles after leaving the scene

news.title: Missing female child reported in Prince George
news.excerpt: Authorities are searching for a 12-year-old female last seen in Prince George, Virginia.

social_media.text: Please help find missing child in Prince George area. Last seen wearing red hoodie, navy sweatpants, red Crocs

provenance._fulltext: A 12-year-old female was last seen at Prince George at 2025-10-03T21:56:39.656445+00:00. The child was reported missing by parent after failing to meet a friend. Within 5 hours of disappearance, movement cues entered vehicle and headed northbound on I-95 suggest travel northbound along I-264. A black 2024 Honda Passport was observed departing near Prince George, Virginia. Around 11 hours later, a neighbor reported someone matching the description (12-year-old female, wearing red hoodie, navy sweatpants, red Crocs) near Craig.
